      • dynamicGreeting

        public java.lang.String dynamicGreeting(java.lang.String userId)
        Feature 1: Dynamic Greeting a dynamic greeting will be responsed if the user has booked a tour before
        Parameters:
        userId - the LINE user ID of the user who entered the keywords (greeting to the LINE chatbot)
        Returns:
        a dynamic greeting will be returned if the user has booked a tour before, otherwise the normal one will be returned

      • createDiscount

        public boolean createDiscount(java.lang.String couponID,
                              int amount,
                              int percentOff)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        this function create a discount record in the Database.
        Parameters:
        couponID - A coupon ID is required to create a discount record in the database.
        amount - The number of discounts to give out.
        percentOff - The discount to be offered (percentOff should be 50 if 50% discount is offered).
        Returns:
        boolean Return True if the discount record can be created successfully, False if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteDiscount

        public boolean deleteDiscount(java.lang.String couponID)

      • getDiscount

        public boolean getDiscount(java.lang.String clientID,
                           java.lang.String couponID)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This function reduces the number of the coupon in the Database, then give a discount COUPON to a client by adding the coupon String in the client record.
        Parameters:
        clientID - A client ID is required to add the discount String in the client record.
        couponID - A coupon ID is required to retrieve corresponding coupon in the database.
        Returns:
        boolean Return True if the discount record can be transferred successfully, False if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
